Membership notes: pre-crisis version first appeared in adventure comics #349 (october 1966); granted honorary membership in adventure comics #360 (september 1967).\nlast remaining member of the green lantern corps, as revealed in final crisis: legion of 3 worlds #2 (november 2008).\nkilled in the same issue by superboy-prime.
Powers: Possesses a Green Lantern power ring.
